verses.roman:
putra saṅge lañā teṅho āilā prabhu-sthāne
putrere karāilā prabhura caraṇa vandane

synonyms: putra—the son; saṅge—along; lañā—taking; teṅho—he; āilā—came; prabhu-sthāne—to the place of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; putrere—his son; karāilā—made to do; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; caraṇa vandane—worshiping the lotus feet.
translation: Taking his son, Śivānanda Sena went to see Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu at His residence. He made his son offer respectful obeisances at the lotus feet of the Lord.
